news_header: Tata Steel's electric furnace project approved for Port Talbot.
news_original_title: Tata Steel £1.25bn electric furnace approved by planners
news_text: Tata Steel's £1.25bn electric arc furnace project at Port Talbot has been approved, aiming for operation by early 2028. It will replace closed blast furnaces, reduce emissions, and create a sustainable business after significant losses.
